title: Quindore Holdings LLC — Institutional Corporate Website

requirements.text: Implement a global visual theme across all pages: background #0B0B0B, primary text #EDEDED, accent/gold #C6A85E. Load 'Playfair Display' (serif) for all headings and 'Inter' (sans-serif) for all body copy via Google Fonts. Apply ultra-generous spacing (section padding minimum 120px vertical), a clean 12-column grid, subtle architectural background texture (fine diagonal or grid line pattern in near-black at low opacity), and thin horizontal gold divider lines between each section. No stock photos, no animations beyond subtle fade-on-scroll, no sliders, no carousels. The overall impression must read as institutional, compliance-grade, and conservative.

quotes: Elegant serif for headings (e.g., Playfair Display)
Subtle gold divider lines between sections

acceptanceCriteria: Background is #0B0B0B site-wide
All headings use Playfair Display; all body copy uses Inter
Gold accent (#C6A85E) is applied to dividers, CTA borders, and highlights
A low-opacity architectural texture is visible behind content on all pages
Thin gold horizontal lines visually separate each major section
No animations other than a subtle fade-in on scroll (CSS only, no JS libraries)

requirements.text: Build the site header containing the Quindore Holdings LLC logo lockup (full wordmark + 'Q' monogram generated asset) left-aligned, and a minimal right-aligned navigation with links: About, Structure, Governance, Contact. The header must be sticky/fixed on scroll, with a semi-transparent dark background and a bottom gold accent line. Header must be fully responsive with a hamburger menu on mobile.

quotes: Integrate your gold logo properly in header

acceptanceCriteria: Logo lockup (wordmark + monogram) renders in the header using the generated asset
Navigation links scroll smoothly to their respective sections
Header is sticky and maintains dark semi-transparent background on scroll
A thin gold line appears at the bottom of the header
On viewports < 768px, navigation collapses into a hamburger menu

requirements.text: Build the Hero section with: headline 'Structured Ownership. Disciplined Governance. Long-Term Value.' in large Playfair Display, subtext 'Quindore Holdings LLC operates as a U.S.-registered parent entity overseeing independent digital operating subsidiaries under centralized strategic and financial oversight.' in Inter, and a single outlined CTA button labeled 'Contact' that anchors to the Contact section. The hero must occupy full viewport height, center-aligned content vertically, with the architectural background texture visible.

quotes: Headline: Structured Ownership. Disciplined Governance. Long-Term Value.
Subtext: Quindore Holdings LLC operates as a U.S.-registered parent entity...

acceptanceCriteria: Hero occupies 100vh
Headline text matches exactly: 'Structured Ownership. Disciplined Governance. Long-Term Value.'
Subtext paragraph renders below the headline in Inter at a smaller weight
'Contact' CTA button is outlined in gold (#C6A85E) and smooth-scrolls to the Contact section
No background image — texture only

requirements.text: Build the About section explaining: (1) Quindore Holdings LLC's role as a parent holding company, not an operating business; (2) centralized governance over subsidiaries; (3) long-term capital discipline and asset development focus; (4) the required disclaimer line 'This domain does not process consumer transactions directly.' The section must use a two-column layout on desktop (heading/summary left, detailed copy right) and a single column on mobile.

quotes: This domain does not process consumer transactions directly.

acceptanceCriteria: All four topics are covered in clear, formal prose
The exact line 'This domain does not process consumer transactions directly.' appears verbatim
Two-column desktop layout; single-column on mobile
Section is separated from adjacent sections by gold divider lines

requirements.text: Build the Operating Structure section explaining the corporate hierarchy: (1) Quindore Holdings LLC as parent holding entity; (2) controlled subsidiaries operating under centralized oversight; (3) independent operating platforms within each subsidiary; (4) note that subsidiaries may transact under their own trade names. Present this as a clean structured text layout — no diagrams in this section; use a labeled grid or stacked card layout with gold accent borders.

quotes: Subsidiaries may transact under their own trade names

acceptanceCriteria: Four structural tiers are clearly labeled and explained
The trade name note is explicitly included
Layout uses a grid or stacked card pattern with gold (#C6A85E) border accents
No diagrams or SVG charts in this section

requirements.text: Build the Compliance & Governance section with formal prose covering: (1) operation under applicable U.S. federal and Wyoming state regulations; (2) internal compliance standards and policies; (3) financial reporting structure; (4) all payments processed exclusively through authorized third-party providers. Use a clean two-column or four-block grid layout with gold-accented category labels.

quotes: Operates under applicable U.S. federal and Wyoming state regulations
Payments processed through authorized third-party providers

acceptanceCriteria: All four compliance topics are covered with precise formal language
Wyoming state and U.S. federal regulatory context is explicitly stated
Third-party payment processor note is included verbatim in concept
Section uses a structured grid layout with gold accent labels

requirements.text: Build a dedicated Corporate Structure page (route /structure) that renders a visual corporate hierarchy diagram showing: Quindore Holdings LLC at the top, with branches to labeled subsidiary placeholders, and further branches to operating platform placeholders. Use a CSS/SVG tree layout styled in the site's dark/gold theme. Include a brief executive summary paragraph above the diagram.
acceptanceCriteria: Page is accessible at /structure route
A hierarchical tree diagram renders with Quindore Holdings LLC as root node
Diagram uses dark background, gold lines, and off-white node labels
Executive summary paragraph appears above the diagram
Diagram is responsive (scrollable on mobile if needed)

requirements.text: Build a dedicated Executive Governance page (route /governance) that expands the governance content with formal sections covering: board-level oversight, internal audit and compliance function, risk management framework, and reporting obligations. Use an editorial two-column layout with section anchors and a right-side in-page navigation menu.
acceptanceCriteria: Page is accessible at /governance route
Four governance sections are present: oversight, audit/compliance, risk management, reporting
Right-side sticky in-page navigation menu links to each section anchor
Two-column editorial layout on desktop; single-column on mobile
Consistent visual theme with site (dark, gold accents, serif headings)

requirements.text: Build the Contact section displaying the email address info@quindore.com as a styled, clickable mailto link. No contact form. Include a brief formal line such as 'For institutional inquiries, please direct correspondence to the address below.' Section must be minimal and uncluttered.
acceptanceCriteria: info@quindore.com renders as a styled mailto link
No contact form is present
Brief formal introductory sentence is displayed
Section is visually minimal and consistent with site theme

requirements.text: Build the site footer containing: registered address '5830 E 2nd St, Ste 7000 #32674, Casper, WY 82609, United States', copyright line '© Quindore Holdings LLC. All rights reserved.', and footer navigation links to Privacy Policy (/privacy), Terms of Service (/terms), and Legal Disclaimer (/legal). Style in a dark sub-footer with muted gold link color and small Inter typography.

quotes: 5830 E 2nd St, Ste 7000 #32674 Casper, WY 82609 United States

acceptanceCriteria: Registered address renders exactly as specified
Copyright line is present
Three footer links navigate to /privacy, /terms, and /legal respectively
Footer uses small Inter typography with muted gold link styling

requirements.text: Build a Privacy Policy page at route /privacy with formal institutional privacy policy content appropriate for a U.S. holding company website, covering: data collection practices (minimal — no e-commerce), use of cookies, third-party services, contact for privacy inquiries (info@quindore.com), and Wyoming governing law. Format as a long-form document page with serif heading, numbered sections, and a 'Last Updated' date.

quotes: Add full Privacy / Terms / Legal pages

acceptanceCriteria: Page accessible at /privacy
Includes sections: data collection, cookies, third-party services, contact, governing law
info@quindore.com listed as privacy contact
Wyoming governing law is referenced
'Last Updated' date is displayed at top
Consistent dark/gold/serif visual theme

requirements.text: Build a Terms of Service page at route /terms with formal terms appropriate for an informational holding company website (no e-commerce, no user accounts). Cover: purpose of the site (informational only), no warranties, limitation of liability, intellectual property, governing law (Wyoming), and contact for legal inquiries (info@quindore.com). Same document layout as the Privacy Policy page.
acceptanceCriteria: Page accessible at /terms
Includes sections: informational purpose, no warranties, liability limitation, IP, governing law, contact
Wyoming governing law explicitly stated
Same visual layout and formatting as the Privacy Policy page

requirements.text: Build a Legal Disclaimer page at route /legal with content clarifying: the website is for informational purposes only, Quindore Holdings LLC is not a licensed financial advisor or investment firm, no content constitutes financial or legal advice, subsidiaries operate independently under their own legal identities, and no consumer-facing transactions occur at this domain. Same document layout as Privacy Policy and Terms pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Page accessible at /legal
Informational-only disclaimer is clearly stated
Not-a-financial-advisor disclaimer is present
Subsidiary independence note is included
No-consumer-transactions note matches the About section disclaimer in spirit
Consistent document layout with other legal pages

requirements.text: The site must be fully responsive across mobile (320px+), tablet (768px+), and desktop (1280px+). All sections, the header/nav, footer, and legal pages must reflow gracefully. Touch targets must meet accessibility minimums. No horizontal scroll on any viewport.
acceptanceCriteria: No horizontal scroll at 320px viewport width
Header collapses to hamburger menu below 768px
All grid layouts stack to single column on mobile
Touch targets are at least 44px
Font sizes remain readable on all viewports

constraints: No stock photos anywhere on the site
No testimonials, reviews, or social proof elements
No marketing language, hype, or exaggerated claims
No sliders, carousels, or auto-playing elements
No heavy JavaScript animations — CSS transitions only
Exact text strings specified by the user (headline, subtext, address, email, disclaimer line) must appear verbatim
Color palette strictly limited to #0B0B0B background, #EDEDED text, #C6A85E accent — no other primary colors
nonGoals: Live chat or contact form (email link only)
DNS/Cloudflare deployment checklist (infrastructure — out of scope for this build)
Stripe review heuristics checklist document (advisory — out of scope)
Investor-grade variant as a separate build

required: Quindore Holdings LLC full wordmark logotype in off-white (#EDEDED) on transparent background, elegant serif lettering with a muted gold 'Q' monogram mark to the left (quindore-logo-lockup.dim_480x80.png)
Standalone 'Q' monogram mark in muted gold (#C6A85E) on transparent background, geometric or architectural style (quindore-monogram.dim_120x120.png)
Subtle architectural background texture — fine orthogonal grid or diagonal line pattern in near-black (#111111) on transparent/dark background, tileable (bg-texture.dim_800x800.png)
